_sText:
*********************************** 
Counter-Strike: Source
*********************************** 
TITLE: CS:S Map - cs_bankjob_final
AUTHOR: Phil Cowey [OFc] Legato
E-MAIL: philcowey@hotmail.co.uk
***********************************
Credits
***********************************
Legato  - Mapping
McClane - Overview/.Nav file
Testing


STORY:

Its 2009, just outside Chicago, Nothern USA. After a botched bankjob terrorist from a wide variety of cells have taken hostages in a little uptown bank. Counter-Terrorists Units from across the world have been called into action putting forward their best or best from each special forces teams.

Lethal force has been confimed...


Special Notes:

cs_bankjob will be heavily TACTICAL based. CTs will HAVE to work as a team in order to not get prawned. 
Some special features of cs_bankjob will be:

-	CCTV, around the outside of building cameras have been operational, terrorists have the ability to see out 	onto particular areas of the building. CTs use smoke, tread carefully, your being watched.

-	Breaching Charges, special areas of the building have been rigged, some walls and some doors. CTs will 			have the ability to blast through the walls and storm in at the push of a button.

-	Alpha Team and Bravo Team, CTs are split into 2 offensive teams; Alpha team begin the round at the front 		of the building while Bravo Team infiltrate from the side alley of the building


Extract all Files into your cstrike/maps folder
